channel.title: How to write your own base
channel.description: Well, title says most. I always coded delta but as i saw some runescape remake's with self-writed base. My question is how can u write your own base?

item.title: How to write your own base
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:4, topic:381467”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=477279.msg3491901#msg3491901 date=1296997014]

you need to be a java pro to do that,

it’s really hard

ok, But if u start with it u start with no files and write all the files yourself?
[/quote]yes[/quote]

ok, thanks for pointing it out. I was thinking about a runescape remake. But currently i’m using delta and i think it won’t turn out well.

Read full topic
item.source: How to write your own base
